website_summaries.verdict: Apple's 12.9-inch iPad Pro tablet is more like a full-scale iOS laptop—which is great if you can get all of your work done in iOS applications.
cons: Apps don't quite complete most workflows

customer_reviews.title: Love this Ipad - it is a perfect size for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this Ipad - it is a perfect size for doing jigsaw puzzles - my husband and I both have one.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I just wish I had known about ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I just wish I had known about the memory restrictions and I would have bought a larger GB.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine M.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth have of what it cost
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. This is stressful to use. Bluetooth hasn't work sense I got it 2 years ago. It ask for a password to my company's network which has no password. No one here can figure it out. I can't get on line no where but my house. Useless. I paid almost $1000 for this worthless thing. I should have send it back and got a surface pro but was hoping my buddy could fix it because that is what he does but he could.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Apple iPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Trying to find smoother one for me. Very HUGE screen
customer_reviews.author: McClinin G.

customer_reviews.title: Used but where ?
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase I've made this year !! Even if it came wrapped in bubble wrap and a fake Apple dongle the iPad is stunning. It says used but where ? No signs of use was noticeable ! Great product and for 300$ less than the original price !? This is a deal I'mma tell you.
customer_reviews.author: Keerian Flammang

customer_reviews.title: I owned the iPad air two and this is so much bigger and better.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife. I owned the iPad air two and this is so much bigger and better.
customer_reviews.author: susan gordon-pinnell

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes a Bargain turn out better than you hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: Given the price that I bought this iPad for, I was really kind of thinking, don't get your hopes up. When I received the iPad today, I was more than pleased with my bargain. Top of the line.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy J. Currens

customer_reviews.title: I use as image viewer, video device mostly
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful screen but to me completely useless as a notebook replacement. Using mostly for Netflix and DSLR picture viewing via Flickr online picture storage, 64GB just fine for me. Obviously way overpriced but I couldn't help it...so convenient with thin profile and instant on...
customer_reviews.author: tall2010

customer_reviews.title: Best order on my entire year
customer_reviews.text: When i ordered the product it showed up as “Like New” condition. I expected an Open Box iPad, to be surprised when it arrived that was a brand new one
customer_reviews.author: Niory Cubillan

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Arrived in timely fashion
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Arrived in timely fashion. End users are busy busy inputting data.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Seminario

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice ipad, very fast, and fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Destry

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy
customer_reviews.text: Description misleading (sounded like it had a wireless cell card slot) Was gifted and now the person needs to go back to the Apple store to fix a wifi disconnect every 5 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Gus Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great product but be careful of the taxes u have ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but be careful of the taxes u have to pay if crossing the border. It might not be worth it to order from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hosein

customer_reviews.title: I'd invest in a Microsoft Surface
customer_reviews.text: Pros 120hz HDR Stereo speakers Cons Some apps are iphone apps Price Takes a while to charge No mouse support No guest login or multiple users No screensavers No animated background
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

product_meta.title: Apple iPad Pro 12.9-Inch 64GB Space Gray (WiFi Only, Mid 2017) MQDA2LL/A
product_meta.description: Powering the large Retina display is the Apple A10X Six-Core chip with a M10 motion coprocessor. This 64-bit chip can pump out desktop-class CPU performance and console-class graphics. The faster performance allows you to multitask with ease, using iOS 10 features, such as Picture in Picture, Slide Over, and Split View. Also, the iPad Pro is capable of editing 4K video, rendering 3D models/images, creating/editing complex documents and presentations, and playing games.
feature_bullets: 12.9-Inch Retina Display, 2732 x 2048 Resolution, True Tone Display
64GB Flash Storage, 4GB RAM, 2.39GHz A10X Processor + M10 Coprocessor
802.11ac Wi-Fi, Rear 12MP iSight Camera; Front 7MP FaceTime HD Camera
Touch ID Fingerprint Sensor, Fingerprint-Resistant Oleophobic Coating
Up to 10 Hours of Battery Life, Apple iOS 10

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars28 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
